alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lowndes, northeastern Thomas, Brooks and southeastern Colquitt Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pavo to near Lake Park. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Moultrie, Quitman, Valdosta, Hahira, Pavo, Coolidge, I-75 At Exit 16, Riverside, Schley, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Enon, South Moultrie, Merrillville and Moultrie Municipal A/P. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
